definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">WEAKNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1200</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">INSTANT_DAMAGE</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">SPEED</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1200</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="controls_if" x="136" y="612"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">WITHER</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Pill Has No Effect Because You Have The Wither Effect.</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_clearpotions"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></xml>
